api_list.name: getScreenshot

required_parameters.name: apiSecret
required_parameters.description: Your actual urlbox API secret which you can get by registering for an account.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the website you want to screenshot.

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: Should be one of either png or jpg depending on which format you want the resulting image

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: Your actual urlbox API key which you can get by registering for an account.

optional_parameters.name: height
optional_parameters.description: Viewport height of the browser in pixels. Default: 1024.

optional_parameters.name: acceptLang
optional_parameters.description: Sets an Accept-Language header on requests to the target URL. Default: en-US.

optional_parameters.name: thumbWidth
optional_parameters.description: Width in pixels of the generated thumbnail, leave off for full-size screenshot.

optional_parameters.name: retina
optional_parameters.description: Take a 'retina' or high definition screenshot equivalent to setting a device pixel ratio of 2.0 or @2x. Please note that retina screenshots will be double the normal dimensions and will normally take slightly longer to process due to the much bigger image size. Default: false

optional_parameters.name: waitFor
optional_parameters.description: Waits for the element specified by this selector to be visible on the page before taking a screenshot.

optional_parameters.name: click
optional_parameters.description: Element selector that is clicked before taking a screenshot e.g. #clickme would click the element with id=`clickme`.

optional_parameters.name: force
optional_parameters.description: Take a fresh screenshot instead of getting a cached version. Default: false

optional_parameters.name: cookie
optional_parameters.description: Set a cookie value before taking a screenshot. E.g. OptIn=true. Can be set multiple times to set more than one cookie.

optional_parameters.name: highlightfg
optional_parameters.description: Text color of the highlighted word. Default: white

optional_parameters.name: quality
optional_parameters.description: JPEG only - image quality of resulting screenshot (0-100). Default: 80

optional_parameters.name: fullPage
optional_parameters.description: Amount of time to wait in milliseconds for the website at url to respond. Default: false

optional_parameters.name: hideSelector
optional_parameters.description: Hides all elements that match the element selector by setting their style to `display:none !important;`. Useful for hiding popups.

optional_parameters.name: useS3
optional_parameters.description: Save the screenshot directly to the S3 bucket configured on your account. Default: false

optional_parameters.name: bgColor
optional_parameters.description: Hex code or css color string. Some websites don't set a body background colour, and will show up as transparent backgrounds with PNG or black when using JPG. Use this setting to set a background colour. If the website explicitly sets a transparent background on the html or body elements, this setting will be overridden.

optional_parameters.name: cropWidth
optional_parameters.description: Crop the width of the screenshot to this size in pixels.

optional_parameters.name: disableJs
optional_parameters.description: Turn off javascript on target url to prevent popups. Default: false

optional_parameters.name: hover
optional_parameters.description: Element selector that is hovered before taking a screenshot e.g. #hoverme would hover over the element with id=`hoverme`.

optional_parameters.name: highlight
optional_parameters.description: Word to highlight on the page before capturing a screenshot.

optional_parameters.name: ttl
optional_parameters.description: Short for 'time to live'. Number of seconds to keep a screenshot in the cache. Note the default is also the maximum value for this option. Default: 2592000

optional_parameters.name: transparent
optional_parameters.description: If a website has no background color set, the image will have a transparent background (PNG only). Default: false

optional_parameters.name: flash
optional_parameters.description: Enable the flash plugin for flash using websites. Default: false

optional_parameters.name: width
optional_parameters.description: Viewport width of the browser in pixels. Default: 1280.

optional_parameters.name: authorization
optional_parameters.description: Sets an Authorization header on requests to the target URL.

optional_parameters.name: highlightbg
optional_parameters.description: Text color of the highlighted word. Default: red

optional_parameters.name: timeout
optional_parameters.description: Amount of time to wait in milliseconds for the website at url to respond. Default: 30000

optional_parameters.name: delay
optional_parameters.description: Amount of time to wait in milliseconds before urlbox takes the screenshot.

optional_parameters.name: s3Path
optional_parameters.description: The s3 path to save the screenshot to in your S3 bucket.

optional_parameters.name: userAgent
optional_parameters.description: User-Agent string used to emulate a particular client.

optional_parameters.name: selector
optional_parameters.description: Take a screenshot of the element that matches this selector.
